subject: Colleges and Universities
Soccer
Blacks
Discrimination
Social Media
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: A private Christian university in Spokane, Wash., suspended five members of its women’s soccer team after a social media post surfaced showing them dressed in blackface and Afro wigs.
snippet: A private Christian university in Spokane, Wash., suspended five members of its women’s soccer team after a social media post surfaced showing them dressed in blackface and Afro wigs.
